# locale

**Instance Property**

The locale to use when formatting the relative date.

## Declaration

```swift
var locale: Locale
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/autoupdatingCurrent]. If you set this property to `nil`, the format style resets to using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSLocale/autoupdatingCurrent].

## Modifying a Relative Date Format Style

- **presentation**: Specifies the style to use when describing a relative date, such as “1 day ago” or “yesterday”.
- **unitsStyle**: The style to use when formatting the quantity or the name of the unit, such as “1 day ago” or “one day ago”.
- **calendar**: The calendar to use when formatting relative dates.
- **capitalizationContext**: The capitalization context to use when formatting the relative dates.
